scripts.build:resources: w4 png2src -t res/template.ts res/door.png res/frog.png res/frog-eyes.png res/frog-walking-1.png res/frog-walking-2.png res/frog-walking-eyes.png res/frog-jumping.png res/frog-jumping-eyes.png res/frog-falling.png res/frog-falling-eyes.png res/frog-sleeping-1.png res/frog-sleeping-1-eyes.png res/frog-sleeping-2.png res/frog-sleeping-2-eyes.png res/egg.png res/egg8.png -o src/sprites.ts
scripts.build:levels: node ./scripts/parse-level.mjs src/game/levels/layout.ts levels/level-1.txt levels/level-2.txt levels/level-3.txt levels/level-4.txt levels/level-5.txt levels/level-6.txt levels/level-7.txt levels/level-8.txt levels/level-9.txt
scripts.build: npm run build:resources && npm run build:levels && asc --target release
scripts.dev: npm run build:resources && npm run build:levels && w4 watch --no-qr
